credit_line: Gift of Robert Conway, Class of 1967
title: John Donne Songs & Sonets, livre d'artiste, text printed by Brider Hartmann, West Berlin and art printed by Marcel Durassier, Paris
medium: fifteen lithographs, twelve monochrome and three in color, with accompanying text from Donne's poems
inscriptions: Signed by artist on edition page with embossed seal
